title: Poncey
alt: A demo gif of Poncey being used in the command line.
description: A npm package that allows users to quickly start up a new React Web Application or static site. This static site generator (SSG) is a great command line tool to get started on a new project.

title: Playlistr
alt: An image of a room being used in the Playlistr app
description: A MERN stack application that utilizes the Spotify API so multiple users can share one queue, add songs to it, and have a chance to control the music.
